item.title: Need someone to code stalls
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“noob coder, post:1, topic:245001”]hi peeps

can someone plz code me stalls

i tried everything!

and its just a 317

i cant get it there

so

i would apriciate it

so thanks![/quote]

ugh damn this community…

			case 2562: //theiving
				TheifStall("Gem stall", "...and recieve 12 gold.", 45, 90 * playerLevel[17], 995, 12, 5, 0x340);
				break;

			case 2563:
				TheifStall("Fur stall", "...and recieve 7 gold.", 28, 50 * playerLevel[17], 995, 7, 5, 0x340);
				break;

			case 2564:
				TheifStall("Spice stall", "...and recieve 10 gold.", 65, 140 * playerLevel[17], 995, 10, 5, 0x340);
				break;

			case 2561:
				TheifStall("Baker's stall", "...and recieve 5 gold.", 0, 25 * playerLevel[17], 995, 5, 5, 0x340);
				break;

			case 2560:
				TheifStall("Silk stall", "...and recieve 15 gold.", 80, 180 * playerLevel[17], 995, 15, 5, 0x340);
				break;

			case 2565:
				TheifStall("Silver stall", "...and recieve 25 gold.", 99, 150 * playerLevel[17], 995, 25, 5, 0x340);
				break;

		}
	}

i pulled that from richscape

and make the objects in the newobjects method or w/e…

and the method

	public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {
		if (actionDelay == 0) {
			if (playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
					setAnimation(emote);
					sendMsg("You steal from the " + stallName);
					sendMsg(message);
					addItem(item, itemAmount);
					addSkillXP(XPamount, 17);
					actionDelay = delay;
				} else if (playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
					sendMsg("You need a theiving level of " + lvlReq + " to theif from this stall.");
			}
		}
	}

Read full topic

void thieve(int stall) {
switch (stall) {
case 1: //ID of stall.
//Actions
break;
case 2:
break; //Etc.
}
}

thieve(1); //Stall ID 1
